abstract: Ian Cumming and Joseph Steinberg of Leucadia National prided themselves on being disciples of Warren E. Buffett, but on Monday the two did something Mr. Buffett has never done: buy an investment bank outright.
snippet: Ian Cumming and Joseph Steinberg of Leucadia National prided themselves on being disciples of Warren E. Buffett, but on Monday the two did something Mr. Buffett has never done: buy an investment bank outright.
lead_paragraph: For years, Leucadia National Corporation followed the investment philosophy of Warren E. Buffett, earning the nickname “Baby Berkshire Hathaway.”

headline.main: With Jefferies Deal, ‘Baby Berkshire’ Deviates From Buffett
headline.print_headline: With Jefferies Deal, ‘Baby Berkshire’ Deviates From Buffett

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
